_aChangeLog.text: Fixed triggers on defence01 so only humans can pass the portal.
Fixed landime killing humans when zombies stepped on them
Fixed triggers teleporting both teams on defence01.
Reworked all of the surf stages.
Added 3 New items - Flamethrower, Landmine, Music box.
Added new surf levels and made the difficulty easier.
Removed the surf part from Surf02. Now only bhop part is there.
Added new rooms and reworked the whole spawn area.
Added a human trigger on Surf03-Surf04 so average players can get teleported quickly.
Removed the Laser Level as a whole
Map made more casual to play. People can play the map whenever they like to.
Any future additon might be added in the map when the map is tested on the servers.

_sText:
Earth is vacant and deserted now. With none in sight. You must surf through the deserted planet and reach the moon where a glorious future awaits you...

Hi! This is my first surf map. And surprisingly made this map in just a day. Quite absurd but true.
Update: Updated the map after a whole year. Finally, it's now playable and enjoyable for players.

Map Contains~
7 Surfs.
3 Defend Points.
3 Human Items ( Flamethrower, Landmine, Music box).

Map is comparatively harder than other Zombie Escape Surf maps, because of fast triggers, some defend points are harder without more humans. Overall, map isÂ  short and really fun. I like de_dust2, so I made this map with de_dust2 layout and surprisingly it turned out to be great.

YOU ARE NOT ALLOWED TO EDIT & RE-UPLOAD THIS MAP.
